dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY hh:mi am') system_date, (SELECT DISTINCT ier.element_ref_value FROM ie_document_response ier INNER JOIN ie_shipmentstatus iess ON ier.i_transaction_no = iess.i_transaction_no INNER JOIN document doc ON iess.tracking_number = doc.document_tracking_num WHERE ier.element_ref_qualifier = 'ES1:INTERNAL TRACKING NUMBER(ITN)' AND doc.owner_object_gid = gtm.gtm_transaction_gid AND NOT ier.element_ref_value IS NULL AND ier.insert_date = ( SELECT MAX(iera.insert_date) FROM ie_document_response iera INNER JOIN ie_shipmentstatus iessa ON iera.i_transaction_no = iessa.i_transaction_no INNER JOIN document doca ON iessa.tracking_number = doca.document_tracking_num WHERE iera.element_ref_qualifier = 'ES1:INTERNAL TRACKING NUMBER(ITN)' AND doca.owner_object_gid = doc.owner_object_gid) AND ROWNUM = 1) itn_number, gtr1.refnum_value ship_ref_number, gtr2.refnum_value trans_ref_number, TO_CHAR(gtd.transaction_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') export_date, gtm.transport_mode_gid transport_method, loc1.city || ', ' || loc1.province_code export_port, loc2.city || ', ' || cc2.country_name unlading_port, gtm.conveyance_name vessel_name, it.item_name commodity, gpcc.classification_code hs_code, gtlq.quantity_value || ' ' || gtlq.uom_code quantity, gtlrq.quantity_value || ' ' || gtlrq.uom_code ship_weight, gtlc.currency_value || ' ' || gtlc.currency_value_currency_gid total_value FROM gtm_transaction gtm LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_transaction_line gtl ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtl.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtl.line_object_no = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_tr_prod_classification gtpc ON gtl.gtm_transaction_line_gid = gtpc.gtm_transaction_line_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_prod_class_code gpcc ON gtpc.gtm_prod_class_code_gid = gpcc.gtm_prod_class_code_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_transaction_date gtd ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtd.gtm_transaction_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_trans_line_quantity gtlq ON gtl.gtm_transaction_line_gid = gtlq.gtm_transaction_line_gid AND gtlq.gtm_quantity_type_gid = 'TOTAL GROSS WEIGHT' LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_trans_line_report_quantity gtlrq ON gtl.gtm_transaction_line_gid = gtlrq.gtm_transaction_line_gid AND gtlrq.gtm_quantity_type_gid = 'NET_WEIGHT' LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_trans_line_currency gtlc ON gtl.gtm_transaction_line_gid = gtlc.gtm_transaction_line_gid AND gtlc.gtm_value_qualifier_gid = 'TOTAL VALUE' LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_transaction_date gtd ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtd.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtd.date_qualifier_gid = 'EXPORT DATE' LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_trans_refnum gtr1 ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtr1.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtr1.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid = 'SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_trans_refnum gtr2 ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtr2.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtr2.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid = 'TRANSPORTATION REFERENCE NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_transaction_port gtp1 ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtp1.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtp1.gtm_port_qualifier_gid = 'PORT OF EXPORT' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON gtp1.location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_transaction_port gtp2 ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtp2.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtp2.gtm_port_qualifier_gid = 'PORT OF UNLADING' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON gtp2.location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc2 ON loc2.country_code3_gid = cc2.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN item it ON gtl.item_gid = it.item_gid WHERE gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = :GTM_TRANSACTION_ID

SELECT DISTINCT con1.contact_xid filer_name, loc1.location_name usppi_name, (SELECT listagg (la1.address_line, CHR(13)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY la1.line_sequence) FROM location_address la1 WHERE la1.location_gid = loc3.location_gid) usppi_address, TRIM(loc3.city || ' ' || loc3.province_code || ' ' || loc3.country_code3_gid) usppi_city_state_zip, gtpr.refnum_value usppi_ein, loc2.location_name consignee_name, (SELECT listagg (la2.address_line, CHR(13)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY la2.line_sequence) FROM location_address la2 WHERE la2.location_gid = loc2.location_gid) consignee_address, TRIM(REPLACE((loc2.city || ' ' || loc2.province_code || ' ' || cc2.country_name),' ', ' ')) consignee_city_state_zip, gpc.gtm_code consignee_type, loc3.province_code origin_state, cc4.country_name dest_country, loc5.location_name carrier FROM gtm_transaction gtm LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip1 ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtip1.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'USPPI' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON gtip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON con1.location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_party_refnum gtpr ON gtip1.involved_party_contact_gid = gtpr.contact_gid AND gtpr.gtm_party_refnum_qual_gid = 'EIN' LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip2 ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtip2.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON gtip2.involved_party_contact_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc2 ON loc2.country_code3_gid = cc2.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_party_code gpc ON gtip2.involved_party_contact_gid = gpc.contact_gid AND gpc.gtm_type_gid = 'ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip3 ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtip3.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtip3.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SHIP_FROM' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON gtip3.involved_party_contact_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip4 ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtip4.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtip4.involved_party_qual_gid = 'DESTINATION LOCATION' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc4 ON gtip4.involved_party_contact_gid = loc4.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc4 ON loc4.country_code3_gid = cc4.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip5 ON gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = gtip5.gtm_transaction_gid AND gtip5.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CARRIER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con5 ON gtip5.involved_party_contact_gid = con5.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc5 ON con5.location_gid = loc5.location_gid WHERE gtm.gtm_transaction_gid = :GTM_TRANSACTION_ID
